data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 159,816 who are far from you in Dhofar, Oman from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dhofar, Oman
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Dhofar, Oman so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 164,500 people living in Dhofar through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Dhofar who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bathari people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, let those from the 1,075 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Dhofar.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Dhofar, Oman has a population of 164,500.

We estimate Dhofar has 1,075 people who might know Jesus, 3,610 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 159,816 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 153 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Dhofar be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.
